commands.description: Docker command with help options showing you available commands on your current docker engine.
List all the all top level images, their repository and tags, and their size.
List all docker containers with both stopped and running containers using --all options
Build a docker image for a project based on configured Dockerfile in a directory.
Build a docker image for a project based on configured Dockerfile in a directory using tag such as latest,alpine, 1.0, 2.0 etc.
